title: Birds Are A Quick Fix For Your Anxiety
description:
Start building your ideal daily routine with Fabulous. The first 100 people who click on the link will get 25% OFF Fabulous Premium: https://thefab.co/scishow8 

Tweeting may not decrease your stress, but the twitter of some birds just might. And can we make people forget their memories?

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow

title: How Pangea Might Have Caused a Climate Crisis
description:
Head to https://linode.com/scishow to get a $100 60-day credit on a new Linode account. Linode offers simple, affordable, and accessible Linux cloud solutions and services.

While we consider the modern climate crisis as being majorly induced by humans, there have been crises in the past without such an easy answer.

Hosted by: Hank Green (he/him)

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow
